src:
The 90's Festival Hadirkan 38 Penampil untuk Bernostalgia
07 Nov 2019, 04:20 by Windy Eka Pramudya
MENGANGKAT tema Big Reunion, The 90's Festival Siap dihelat Sabtu dan Minggu, 23-24 November 2019 di Gambir Expo Kemayoran, Jakarta. Di tahun kelima penyelenggaraannya, Akselerasi Entertainment selaku promotor sengaja menambah durasi festival menjadi dua hari. Hal ini dikarenakan antusiasme penonton yang semakin tinggi.
Promotor The 90's Festival, Arinda Mentari Putri mengatakan, dengan ditambahnya durasi festival menjadi dua hari, para penikmat musik dari era 1990-an dapat bernostalgia lebih lama. Menurut Arinda, selain dapat menikmati sajian musik, para pengunjung dapat juga menikmati kuliner, film, mainan, dan hal-hal lain yang dirindukan saat era 1990-an.
Selama dua hari, festival akan menghadirkan aksi 38 penampil yang terdiri atas empat band mancanegara, dan 34 musisi tanah air. Mereka akan berbagi pentas di empat panggung yang tersedia.
Untuk band mancanegara, Hanson dan Aqua dijadwalkan akan tampil Sabtu, 23 November 2019. Sementara itu, pada Minggu, 24 November 2019, akan tampil Michael Learns To Rock dan Vertical Horizon.
"Empat band internasional ini merupakan permintaan dari para penikmat musik 1990-an. Alhamdulillah kami senang bisa menghadirkan mereka di The 90's Festival edisi kelima ini. Bagi Hanson dan Aqua ini menjadi pengalaman pertama mereka tampil di Indonesia, tentunya penampilan mereka layak untuk dinantikan," tutur Arinda pada jumpa wartawan di Harris Vertu Harmoni, Jakarta, Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Selain empat band mancanegara, berikut para pengisi The 90's Festival. Mereka adalah KLa Project, Godbless, Naif, Jamrud, Potret, P-Project, Tofu (reuni), Element (reuni), Powerslaves, ME Voices, Adoria featuring Lingua, Warna, Wong (reuni), Purpose, Wayang, Save Lagu Anak, Sheila on 7, Gigi, Vina Panduwinata, Dr PM (reuni), Tipe-X, Fariz RM, Arwarna, Iwa K, Bunglon, U'camp (reuni), MLD Jazz Project Season 4 featuring Humania, Sweet Martabak, DOT, 7 Kurcaci, Jingga, dan Cherry Bombshell.
Arinda mengungkapkan, bukan hal mudah untuk mengumpulkan para musisi kenamaan dari era 1990-an untuk bergabung di festival musik ini. Promotor juga perlu upaya ekstra bagi band yang akan tampil dalam formasi reuni. 
"Tahun ini kami berhasil mengumpulkan para musisi 1990-an yang sudah lama vakum di industri musik Indonesia. Salah satu kendalanya adalah mereka sudah tidak punya manajer jadi kami menghubungi mereka secara personal dan kebanyakan lewat media sosial," ungkap Arinda.
Pergelaran The 90's Festival edisi kelima ini akan menjadi ajang reuni para musisi. tahun ini, salah satu yang akan reuni adalah grup vokal Tofu yang digawangi Uya, Fla, Anton, dan Joeniar Arief. Selain Tofu , ada band asal Bandung, Wong yang juga akan reuni. Band yang dihuni Heppy (vokal), Gangan (gitar), Herman (bas), Iwan (gitar), dan Remmi (drum) ini akan kembali berkumpul setelah 17 tahun vakum.



Tidak hanya dua band tersebut, The 90’s Festival juga akan membuat Dr PM berkumpul. Tak ketinggalan band Element yang mengusung proyek musik Element Reunion. Terakhir ada juga reuni band rock U'camp yang akan menyapa pendengar mereka di The 90's Festival.
Menurut Arinda, tingkat kesulitan menggelar festival jelas berbeda jika dibandingkan dengan mengadakan konser tunggal. Apalagi jika ditambah membawa artis internasional, persiapannya tentu lebih rumit.
"Untuk band mancanegara yang tampil tahun ini, mereka sedang tidak dalam tur. Jadi mereka khusus datang ke Jakarta untuk tampil di The 90's Festival. Untuk Hanson saja kami pendekatannya dua tahun agar bisa tampil di The 90's Festival," ujar Arinda.
Penyelenggaraan The 90's Festival edisi kelima ini bekerja sama dengan Traveloka Experience sebagai mitra ekslusif pemesanan tiket. Head of Marketing Traveloka Experience Terry Santoso mengungkapkan, sebagai mitra ekslusif mereka berharap dapat menghadirkan kemudahan bagi para penikmat musik di era 1990-an.
Selain menawarkan paket bundling, Traveloka Experience juga menawarkan program promosi cashback 10 persen. Program cashback ini berlaku untuk pemesanan tiket kategori festival per hari atau per dua hari, mulai 11-17 November 2019 khusus 1000 pembeli pertama.***

Baca Juga
text:
The 90's Festival Presents 38 Performers to Reminisce
Nov 7 2019, 04:20 by Windy Eka Pramudya
Raising the theme of Big Reunion, The 90's Festival Ready to be held Saturday and Sunday, 23-24 November 2019 at Gambir Expo Kemayoran, Jakarta. In its fifth year, Acceleration Entertainment as the promoter deliberately increased the duration of the festival to two days. This is due to the increasingly high enthusiasm of the audience.
The 90's Festival promoter, Arinda Mentari Putri said, with the addition of the duration of the festival to two days, music lovers from the 1990s can reminisce longer. According to Arinda, besides being able to enjoy music offerings, visitors can also enjoy culinary, films, toys, and other things that were missed during the 1990s.
For two days, the festival will present 38 action performers consisting of four foreign bands, and 34 musicians in the country. They will share the stage on the four available stages.
For foreign bands, Hanson and Aqua are scheduled to perform Saturday, November 23, 2019. Meanwhile, on Sunday, November 24, 2019, Michael Learns To Rock and Vertical Horizon will perform.
"These four international bands are requests from music connoisseurs of the 1990s. Alhamdulillah, we are glad to be able to present them at The 90's Festival this fifth edition. For Hanson and Aqua, this will be their first experience performing in Indonesia, surely their performance is worth the wait," Arinda said at a press conference at Harris Vertu Harmoni, Jakarta, Wednesday, November 6, 2019.
In addition to the four international bands, the performers of The 90's Festival. They are KLa Project, Godbless, Naive, Emerald, Portrait, P-Project, Tofu (reunion), Element (reunion), Powerslaves, ME Voices, Adoria featuring Lingua, Color, Wong (reunion), Purpose, Puppet, Save Children's Song , Sheila on 7, Gigi, Vina Panduwinata, Dr. PM (reunion), Type-X, Fariz RM, Arwarna, Iwa K, Chameleon, U'camp (reunion), MLD Jazz Project Season 4 featuring Humania, Sweet Martabak, DOT, 7 Dwarves, Orange, and Cherry Bombshells.
Arinda revealed, it was not easy to gather famous musicians from the 1990s to join this music festival. Promoters also need extra effort for the band that will appear in a reunion formation.
"This year we managed to gather the 1990s musicians who have long been vacuum in the Indonesian music industry. One of the obstacles is that they don't have a manager so we contact them personally and mostly through social media," said Arinda.
The fifth edition of The 90's Festival will be a musician reunion. this year, the one who will be reuniting is the vocal group Tofu fronted by Uya, Fla, Anton, and Joeniar Arief. Besides Tofu, there is a band from Bandung, Wong who will also be reuniting. The band, which is inhabited by Heppy (vocals), Gangan (guitar), Herman (bass), Iwan (guitar), and Remmi (drums), will gather again after 17 years of vacuum.



Not only the two bands, The 90's Festival will also make Dr. PM gather. Not to forget the band Element that carries the music project Element Reunion. Finally there is also the reunion of the rock band U'camp who will greet their listeners at The 90's Festival.
According to Arinda, the level of difficulty in holding a festival is clearly different when compared to holding a solo concert. Especially if coupled with bringing international artists, the preparation is certainly more complicated.
"For foreign bands who performed this year, they are not on tour. So they specifically came to Jakarta to perform at The 90's Festival. For Hanson, we approached it for two years to be able to perform at The 90's Festival," Arinda said.
The fifth edition of The 90's Festival is in collaboration with Traveloka Experience as an exclusive ticket booking partner. Traveloka Experience Head of Marketing Terry Santoso revealed, as an exclusive partner they hoped to bring convenience to music lovers in the 1990s.
In addition to offering bundling packages, Traveloka Experience also offers a 10 percent cashback promotion program. This cashback program is valid for ticket reservations for the festival category per day or every two days, starting November 11-17 2019 specifically for the first 1000 buyers. ***
